alert.note: Alert for Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 9:11PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Umatilla and west central Union Counties through 945 PM PDT... At 911 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lehman Hot Springs, or 32 miles southwest of Meacham, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lehman Hot Springs and Starkey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
